TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON , of ORG .

The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicant and his wife bought from the GPE municipality a CARDINAL - room apartment of QUANTITY , which had become State property by virtue of the nationalisations carried out by the communist regime in GPE after DATE .

In DATE , following a renewal of the time - limit to bring an action under section CARDINAL of the Restitution Law DATE , the heirs of the former owners of the apartment brought a new action against the applicant and his wife , invoking new grounds for nullity .
The applicant 's wife died on an unspecified date before DATE .
In a final judgment of ORG of DATE the claim was allowed and the title of the applicant and his late wife was found to have been null and void .

Following the communication of the present application , on DATE the Government informed the ORG that on DATE the applicant and his CARDINAL daughters , acting as their mother 's heirs , had sold the apartment at issue to a third party .
